body.description: Amplify any office or workspace with the comfort and modern style of the Flash Furniture Whitney LeatherSoft Office Desk Chair. This mid-back LeatherSoft swivel office chair adds stylish, comfortable seating to any work area to help busy workers or students achieve maximum comfort day after day while performing their work duties. Not only does this swivel desk chair work great for offices, it also thrives in nail salons, car shops, retail stores, at-home work desks, college dorm rooms, or student study spaces. It boasts a soft and durable mid-back brown LeatherSoft back and seat paired with a black metal base and armrests all highlighted by an attractive horizontal line stitching to effortlessly boost your desk or work area with modern style. Packed with ergonomic features, the thickly padded waterfall front seat helps relieve pressure from the legs while the soft padded armrests relieve pressure from your neck so you can take on long work days without discomfort. Additionally, the highly customizable chair features a pneumatic height adjustable swivel seat for easy maneuverability and tilt lock mechanism that lets you tilt the chair backwards or lock it in an upright position to create a comfortable, custom seating experience. Lean back while as you enjoy your lunch break or take a quick phone call, or lock in an upright position once it's time to focus. This stylish mid-back office chair measures 26" W x 27" D x 39.25-43" H and can be assembled quickly with the included tools and step-by-step instructions, and it wipes clean with a damp cloth for easy cleaning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and cute!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This design is so adorable 😍 and it was super easy to put together. The chair moves up and down smoothly. The chair is also soft but mostly more firm which I enjoy. I would say if you do need a chair the reclines forward and back, this chair does NOT have that ability. Something to consider if you like having that. Hope this help!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and comfortable.
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to put together, nice features, such as hidden screws.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this office chair as I needed a new one and decided to go with the white/gold to match my desk. Although the gold on the chair and my desk are two different finishes of gold, it has a bit of a chic-like look and feel to it.I know many of the reviews say this chair is very easy to assemble but it’s more like semi-easy-ish. While understanding the parts and having the knowledge of assembling the chair, it’s not as easy to assemble if you’re doing it by yourself. Many of the screw placement holes don’t fully align correctly so you have to use force to manually align your parts to each hole in order to successfully drill all of your screws in tightly. Assembly time is much slower when using a manual Allen wrench so I suggest using a powered one instead as it’s more efficient.It’s a comfortable chair and I personally like the straight back support it gives me. I have read reviews that the chair will decline in quality after heavy use but unless you are jumping on this thing, I don’t think the wear and tear will happen. I can’t say the same for the faux leather element because we just never know.Overall, it’s not a bad chair for the price. I would recommend it for yourself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My boyfriend bought me this chair for when I WFH. It arrived quickly and packaged very well! It was put together in about 15 minutes and it is beautiful and comfortable !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for occasional use
reviews.reviewText: Surprisingly nice chair for the money. They look good and comfortable for conference meetings. I wouldn't like this as an every day, all day chair, I don't think it would hold up to that. At work we have a bunch of these in the conf room and it's exactly what I wanted. Only bummer is Made in China, but that's expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not great quality
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to love this chair... but I just can't. I do feel like the quality is probably in line with the price (I still feel like this is probably overpriced for the quality and it is more of a $100 chair); however, I still can't get beyond a few things. First, the chair is a beautiful white color, but the fabric feels and looks extremely cheap. Out of the box, the fabric already seems to be "stretched" in a few places, and I predict it will begin to show wear very quickly. There were also several small tears in the fabric immediately out of the box. Secondly, while the chair has a wonderfully comfortable cushion, the back feels too "upright", and the chair doesn't lean back easily or with any "flow" to it. Also, as others have noted, the casters are terrible and do not roll. When trying to roll the chair, half of the casters don't even turn in the correct direction and instead skid across the floor. Lastly, the assembly was made more difficult due to the screw holes not lining up properly forcing the screws to need to be put in at an angle. At the end of the day, repackaging and sending back would be more trouble than I am looking to go through. This is meant to be a temporary chair, so it will certainly get the job done for now. However, if I could do it over again, I would have selected a different chair.
Elegante , cómoda , fácil de armar . La amé!!!
Easy enough to get together. The chair is actually very pretty and very comfortable. I have wide hips and I fit really good i it.

I actually chose this chair for the rose gold color but it turned out to be a decent chair! It's very pretty and the rose gold is perfect! It's not super plush...it sits me completely upright and seems as if it will support proper posture. There is no lumbar adjustment but I think it will be sufficient for me in my home office. Shipping was fast and assembly was easy. I am not sure on the longevity but I will update my review if it doesn't hold up to daily use.UPDATE: I have been using this chair for over a month now and it certainly is not meant for full-time use. The height adjustment doesn't stay where it is set- you sink slowly over the course of the day. The lack of support means this is a good chair for a casual office but it you work full-time from home like I do- this chair won't cut it.
Its easy to assemble. Im just not that bright. But this thing is gosh darn perfect!
